title: LAN IP allocation of halls
text:
IIT Kharagpur campus provides facility of both LAN and WiFi for internet connectivity. There is no official document availed by the administration with the information of IP allocation for different Halls and Academic complexes. The information below is collected from personally enquiring boarders of different halls.
